title: Drawing, 1969-165-291, 1959
signed: In graphite, lower right: ALEXANDER GIRARD / ARCHITECT / P.O.BOX 707 SANTA FE, NEW MEXICO
inscribed: In graphite, lower right: DESIGN FOR FABRIC SERIES #408  "RODS"/ DATE: 25 FEB. 1959 / SCALE: FULL SIZE / JOB.NO. #408 / DRAWING NO.; Verso: in graphite, upper left corner: XVI-8
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
description: Actual size drawing for pattern of alternating thick columns with small rectangles and thin vertical columns. The drawing is annotated in English and Spanish.
